com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet

Class Facets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facets

  • public class Facets
extends Object
    Utility class offering static user friendly methods to create intuitively facets for a search query.
    Since:
    29.06.16.
    Author:
    Thomas Kurz (tkurz@apache.org)

    • Method Detail

      • term

        public static HashMap<String,Facet> term(FieldDescriptor<?>... descriptors)
        Creates a basic facet query object (Facet.TermFacet) for each FieldDescriptor provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        descriptors - FieldDescriptor[] group of fields to create facets for.
        Returns:
        HashMap A map of Facet.TermFacet which key is the name of the field they apply to.

      • term

        public static HashMap<String,Facet> term(Filter.Scope scope,
                                         FieldDescriptor<?>... descriptors)
        Creates a basic facet query object (Facet.TermFacet) for each FieldDescriptor provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        scope - sets the scope where the facet will be done.
        descriptors - FieldDescriptor[] group of fields to create facets for.
        Returns:
        HashMap A map of Facet.TermFacet which key is the name of the field they apply to.

      • term

        public static HashMap<String,Facet> term(String... names)
        Creates a basic facet query object (Facet.TermFacet) for each field provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        names - String group of name fields to create facets for.
        Returns:
        HashMap A map of Facet.TermFacet which key is the name of the field they apply to.

      • term

        public static HashMap<String,Facet> term(Filter.Scope scope,
                                         String... names)
        Creates a basic facet query object (Facet.TermFacet) for each field provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        scope - sets the scope where the facet will be done.
        names - String group of name fields to create facets for.
        Returns:
        HashMap A map of Facet.TermFacet which key is the name of the field they apply to.

      • type

        public static Facet type()
        Creates a basic facet by document type (Facet.TypeFacet).
        Returns:
        HashMap A map of Facet.TermFacet which key is 'DocType'.

      • range

        public static <T extends Number> Facet range(String name,
                                             FieldDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                                             T start,
                                             T end,
                                             T gap,
                                             String... pivotNames)
        Creates a numeric range facet query object (Facet.NumericRangeFacet) for each field provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the instance of the facet. It should be alphanumeric.
        descriptor - FieldDescriptor to do the range query on. T must extend Number.
        start - T Starting value of the defined range. T must extend Number.
        end - T Ending value of the defined range. T must extend Number.
        gap - T Size of the steps in which the range is divided to facet the results. T must extend Number.
        pivotNames -
        Returns:
        Facet.NumericRangeFacet object.

      • range

        public static <T extends Number> Facet range(Filter.Scope scope,
                                             String name,
                                             FieldDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                                             T start,
                                             T end,
                                             T gap,
                                             String... pivotNames)
        Creates a numeric range facet query object (Facet.NumericRangeFacet) for each field provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        scope - in which the facet will be done.
        name - String with a custom name for the instance of the facet. It should be alphanumeric.
        descriptor - FieldDescriptor to do the range query on. T must extend Number.
        start - T Starting value of the defined range. T must extend Number.
        end - T Ending value of the defined range. T must extend Number.
        gap - T Size of the steps in which the range is divided to facet the results. T must extend Number.
        pivotNames -
        Returns:
        Facet.NumericRangeFacet object.

      • range

        public static <T extends ZonedDateTime> Facet range(String name,
                                                    MultiValueFieldDescriptor.DateFieldDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                                                    T start,
                                                    T end,
                                                    Duration gap,
                                                    String... pivotNames)
        Creates a date range facet query object (Facet.DateRangeFacet) for the multivalued field provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the instance of the facet. It should be alphanumeric.
        descriptor - MultiValueFieldDescriptor.DateFieldDescriptor to do the range query on. T must extend ZonedDateTime.
        start - T Starting value of the defined range. T must extend ZonedDateTime.
        end - T Ending value of the defined range. T must extend ZonedDateTime.
        gap - Duration Size of the steps in which the range is divided to facet the results.
        pivotNames -
        Returns:
        Facet.DateRangeFacet.ZoneDateRangeFacet object.

      • range

        public static <T extends Date> Facet range(String name,
                                           MultiValueFieldDescriptor.UtilDateFieldDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                                           T start,
                                           T end,
                                           Long gap,
                                           TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                           String... pivotNames)
        Creates a date range facet query object (Facet.DateRangeFacet) for the multivalued field provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the instance of the facet. It should be alphanumeric.
        descriptor - MultiValueFieldDescriptor.UtilDateFieldDescriptor to do the range query on. T must extend Date.
        start - T Starting value of the defined range. T must extend Date.
        end - T Ending value of the defined range. T must extend Date.
        gap - Long Size of the steps in which the range is divided to facet the results.
        timeUnit - TimeUnit Units in which the gap is given.
        pivotNames - * @return Facet.DateRangeFacet.UtilDateRangeFacet object.

      • range

                                           String name,
                                           SingleValueFieldDescriptor.UtilDateFieldDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                                           T start,
                                           T end,
                                           Long gap,
                                           TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                           String... pivotNames)
        Creates a date range facet query object (Facet.DateRangeFacet) for the singlevalued field provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        scope - in which the facet will be done.
        name - String with a custom name for the instance of the facet. It should be alphanumeric.
        descriptor - MultiValueFieldDescriptor.UtilDateFieldDescriptor to do the range query on. T must extend Date.
        start - T Starting value of the defined range. T must extend Date.
        end - T Ending value of the defined range. T must extend Date.
        gap - Long Size of the steps in which the range is divided to facet the results.
        timeUnit - TimeUnit Units in which the gap is given.
        pivotNames - * @return Facet.DateRangeFacet.UtilDateRangeFacet object.

      • range

        public static <T extends Date> Facet range(String name,
                                           ComplexFieldDescriptor<?,T,?> descriptor,
                                           T start,
                                           T end,
                                           Long gap,
                                           TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                           String... pivotNames)

      • pivot

        public static Facet pivot(String name,
                          FieldDescriptor<?>... fieldDescriptors)
        Creates a basic pivot facet query on a group of fields. A basic pivot facet query returns a decision tree of the specified fields.
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the new instance.
        fieldDescriptors - A group of FieldDescriptor objects on which perform the pivot query
        Returns:
        Facet.PivotFacet object.

      • pivot

        public static Facet pivot(Filter.Scope scope,
                          String name,
                          FieldDescriptor<?>... fieldDescriptors)
        Creates a basic pivot facet query on a group of fields. A basic pivot facet query returns a decision tree of the specified fields.
        Parameters:
        scope - in which the facet will be done.
        name - String with a custom name for the new instance.
        fieldDescriptors - A group of FieldDescriptor objects on which perform the pivot query
        Returns:
        Facet.PivotFacet object.

      • query

        public static Facet query(String name,
                          Filter filter,
                          String... pivotNames)
        Creates a query facet. A query facet restricts the facet results based on a group of filters.
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the new instance.
        filter - Filter to apply to the facet results.
        pivotNames - Name of the pivots using this facet.
        Returns:
        Facet.QueryFacet object.

      • query

      • stats

        public static <T extends CharSequence> Facet.StatsFacet<T> stats(String name,
                                                                 MultiValueFieldDescriptor.TextFieldDescriptor<T> field,
                                                                 String... pivotNames)
        Creates a basic stats facet query for a multivalued text field. A stats facet query returns statistics calculated based on documents for an specific document field any type T. This class covers the statistics which can be perform on any kind of content.
        Type Parameters:
        T - T class must extend CharSequence
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the new instance.
        field - MultiValueFieldDescriptor.TextFieldDescriptor to calculate the statistics on.
        Returns:
        Facet.StatsFacet object.
